719430f-a.text:
At the intersection of East Broadway (left) and Canal Street (right), showing a view westward from Rutgers Street. On the extreme right, appears a portion of Seward Park. In the background on Canal Street, is seen the Canal Street station of the Second Ave. Elevated Line, and on East Broadway, a
portion of the Manhattan Bridge.
June 6, 1930.
P. L. Sperr.
719430f-a.folder: East Broadway & Canal Street, Manhattan, NY
